content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
The world’s most-loved puzzle game arrives on PlayStation®Vita system, and is better than ever in Tetris® Ultimate. With nine exciting modes, fun new features, and unique visuals, the evolution of this iconic game is the ultimate must-have on PlayStation®Vita system.

In this fast-paced game of skills, you can take on the puzzle game solo or with a friend. Players can get in on the action and can play anyone of six modes – Marathon, Endless, Ultra, Sprint, Battle and Battle Ultimate, plus three PlayStation®Vita-exclusive modes – Haunted, Landslide, and Time’s Up.

Leaderboards make it easy to post your scores and see how you measure up against your friends. An official Tetris Rank in the shape of Tetriminos has been implemented to classify and identify the top players. Are you one of the best in the world?

1-4 player(s)
10000KB Minimum

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
